SQL_STMT_U.val: Update dbo.STAT_LagerStrukturAnalyse set Monat1 = isnull((Select sum(Case when isnull(b.Teilung,0)<>0 then b.Liefermenge/b.Teilung else 0 end) FROM POSITIONEN b left outer join AUFTRAGKOPF ak on b.Ebene1=ak.Ebene1 and b.Ebene2=ak.Ebene2 and b.Ebene3=ak.Ebene3 and b.Ebene4=ak.Ebene4 and b.Auftnr=ak.AuftragsNr where (ak.an_Lager_buchen is null or ak.an_Lager_buchen=0) and (ak.Geschaeftsfall is null or ak.Geschaeftsfall<>':2') and (dateadd(MM,datediff(MM,0,(dateadd(MM, datediff(MM,0,b.Auftrags_Datum),0))),0))= (dateadd(MM,datediff(MM,0,(dateadd(MM, datediff(MM,0,':1')-12,0))),0)) and a.ARTNR=b.Artikel_Nr and a.Ebene1=b.Ebene1 and a.Ebene2=b.Ebene2 and a.Ebene3=b.Ebene3 and a.Ebene4=b.Ebene4 and (b.Auft0Rep1W2AL3AL3=1 or b.Auft0Rep1W2AL3AL3=0) group by dateadd(month, datediff(month, 0, b.Auftrags_Datum),0)),0) from dbo.STAT_LagerStrukturAnalyse a Update dbo.STAT_LagerStrukturAnalyse set Monat2 = isnull((Select sum(Case when isnull(b.Teilung,0)<>0 then b.Liefermenge/b.Teilung else 0 end) FROM POSITIONEN b left outer join AUFTRAGKOPF ak on b.Ebene1=ak.Ebene1 and b.Ebene2=ak.Ebene2 and b.Ebene3=ak.Ebene3 and b.Ebene4=ak.Ebene4 and b.Auftnr=ak.AuftragsNr where (ak.an_Lager_buchen is null or ak.an_Lager_buchen=0) and (ak.Geschaeftsfall is null or ak.Geschaeftsfall<>':2') and (dateadd(MM,datediff(MM,0,(dateadd(MM, datediff(MM,0,b.Auftrags_Datum),0))),0))= (dateadd(MM,datediff(MM,0,(dateadd(MM, datediff(MM,0,':1')-11,0))),0)) and a.ARTNR=b.Artikel_Nr and a.Ebene1=b.Ebene1 and a.Ebene2=b.Ebene2 and a.Ebene3=b.Ebene3 and a.Ebene4=b.Ebene4 and (b.Auft0Rep1W2AL3AL3=1 or b.Auft0Rep1W2AL3AL3=0) group by dateadd(month, datediff(month, 0, b.Auftrags_Datum),0)),0) from dbo.STAT_LagerStrukturAnalyse a Update dbo.STAT_LagerStrukturAnalyse set Monat3 = isnull((Select sum(Case when isnull(b.Teilung,0)<>0 then b.Liefermenge/b.Teilung else 0 end) FROM POSITIONEN b left outer join AUFTRAGKOPF ak on b.Ebene1=ak.Ebene1 and b.Ebene2=ak.Ebene2 and b.Ebene3=ak.Ebene3 and b.Ebene4=ak.Ebene4 and b.Auftnr=ak.AuftragsNr where (ak.an_Lager_buchen is null or (dateadd(MM,datediff(MM,0,(dateadd(MM, datediff(MM,0,':1')-10,0))),0)) and a.ARTNR=b.Artikel_Nr and a.Ebene1=b.Ebene1 and a.Ebene2=b.Ebene2 and a.Ebene3=b.Ebene3 and a.Ebene4=b.Ebene4 and (b.Auft0Rep1W2AL3AL3=1 or b.Auft0Rep1W2AL3AL3=0) group by dateadd(month, datediff(month, 0, b.Auftrags_Datum),0)),0) from dbo.STAT_LagerStrukturAnalyse a Update dbo.STAT_LagerStrukturAnalyse set dbo.STAT_LagerStrukturAnalyse a

datediff(MM,0,b.Auftrags_Datum),0))),0))= (dateadd(MM,datediff(MM,0,(dateadd(MM, datediff(MM,0,':1')- 3,0))),0)) and a.ARTNR=b.Artikel_Nr and a.Ebene1=b.Ebene1 and a.Ebene2=b.Ebene2 and a.Ebene3=b.Ebene3 and a.Ebene4=b.Ebene4 and (b.Auft0Rep1W2AL3AL3=1 or b.Auft0Rep1W2AL3AL3=0) group by dateadd(month, datediff(month, 0, b.Auftrags_Datum),0)),0) from dbo.STAT_LagerStrukturAnalyse a Update dbo.STAT_LagerStrukturAnalyse set Monat11 = isnull((Select sum(Case when isnull(b.Teilung,0)<>0 then b.Liefermenge/b.Teilung else 0 end) FROM POSITIONEN b left outer join AUFTRAGKOPF ak on b.Ebene1=ak.Ebene1 and b.Ebene2=ak.Ebene2 and b.Ebene3=ak.Ebene3 and b.Ebene4=ak.Ebene4 and b.Auftnr=ak.AuftragsNr where (ak.an_Lager_buchen is null or ak.an_Lager_buchen=0) and (ak.Geschaeftsfall is null or ak.Geschaeftsfall<>':2') and (dateadd(MM,datediff(MM,0,(dateadd(MM, datediff(MM,0,b.Auftrags_Datum),0))),0))= (dateadd(MM,datediff(MM,0,(dateadd(MM, datediff(MM,0,':1')- 2,0))),0)) and a.ARTNR=b.Artikel_Nr and a.Ebene1=b.Ebene1 and a.Ebene2=b.Ebene2 and a.Ebene3=b.Ebene3 and a.Ebene4=b.Ebene4 and (b.Auft0Rep1W2AL3AL3=1 or b.Auft0Rep1W2AL3AL3=0) group by dateadd(month, datediff(month, 0, b.Auftrags_Datum),0)),0) from dbo.STAT_LagerStrukturAnalyse a Update dbo.STAT_LagerStrukturAnalyse set Monat12 = isnull((Select sum(Case when isnull(b.Teilung,0)<>0 then b.Liefermenge/b.Teilung else 0 end) FROM POSITIONEN b left outer join AUFTRAGKOPF ak on b.Ebene1=ak.Ebene1 and b.Ebene2=ak.Ebene2 and b.Ebene3=ak.Ebene3 and b.Ebene4=ak.Ebene4 and b.Auftnr=ak.AuftragsNr where (ak.an_Lager_buchen is null or ak.an_Lager_buchen=0) and (ak.Geschaeftsfall is null or ak.Geschaeftsfall<>':2') and (dateadd(MM,datediff(MM,0,(dateadd(MM, datediff(MM,0,b.Auftrags_Datum),0))),0))= (dateadd(MM,datediff(MM,0,(dateadd(MM, datediff(MM,0,':1')- 1,0))),0)) and a.ARTNR=b.Artikel_Nr and a.Ebene1=b.Ebene1 and a.Ebene2=b.Ebene2 and a.Ebene3=b.Ebene3 and a.Ebene4=b.Ebene4 and (b.Auft0Rep1W2AL3AL3=1 or b.Auft0Rep1W2AL3AL3=0) group by dateadd(month, datediff(month, 0, b.Auftrags_Datum),0)),0) from dbo.STAT_LagerStrukturAnalyse a

Update dbo.STAT_LagerStrukturAnalyse set Monat_AVG = Jahresverbrauch/12 Update dbo.STAT_LagerStrukturAnalyse set Monat_StdDev = SQRT((Square(Monat1-Monat_AVG)+SQUARE(Monat2-Monat_AVG)+SQUARE(Monat3-Monat_AVG)+SQUARE(Monat4-Monat_AVG)+SQUARE(Monat5-Monat_AVG)+SQUARE(Monat6-Monat_AVG)+SQUARE(Monat7-Monat_AVG)+SQUARE(Monat8-Monat_AVG)+SQUARE(Monat9-Monat_AVG)+SQUARE(Monat10-Monat_AVG)+SQUARE(Monat11-Monat_AVG)+SQUARE(Monat12-Monat_AVG))/11) Update dbo.STAT_LagerStrukturAnalyse set VariationsKoeffizient= CASE when Monat_AVG <>0 then Monat_StdDev/Monat_AVG else 0 end Update dbo.STAT_LagerStrukturAnalyse set XYZ_Kategorie= CASE when VariationsKoeffizient<=:1 then 'X' when VariationsKoeffizient>:1 and VariationsKoeffizient<=:2 then 'Y' else 'Z' end Update dbo.STAT_LagerStrukturAnalyse set ABC_XYZ_Kategorie= ABC_Jahresverbrauch + XYZ_Kategorie
update dbo.STAT_LagerStrukturAnalyse set Trend3Monate = (Monat12+Monat11+Monat10)/3 update dbo.STAT_LagerStrukturAnalyse set Sollbestand = (select case when Trend3Monate >= Monat_AVG and Trend3Monate >= Monat12 then Trend3Monate when Monat_AVG >= Trend3Monate and Monat_AVG >= Monat12 then Monat_AVG when Monat12>= Monat_AVG and Monat12>= Trend3Monate then Monat12 else Monat12 end) from dbo.STAT_LagerStrukturAnalyse
